I can search data by commands on node js wiki.
Js benefits.
project-weaknesses:
Plugin Customization experience is not good, its been long time since i customized it. but i remember some flaws which i encountered & now forgot. Iirc it was lack of customization compare to tools like emacs.

I think, in survey, it is good to ask "do you use TiddlyWiki everyday or weekly or monthly"

Looking forward to tiddlymultiwikiserver or name like that
ok-to-publish: Yes, I am happy for my responses to be published
